Enable customers to filter the product c: Enable customers to filter the product collection by rating.

The widget area containing Collection Fi: The widget area containing the Collection Filters block needs to be placed on a product archive page for filters to function properly.
When added to a post or page, Collection: When added to a post or page, the Collection Filters block needs to be nested inside a Product Collection block to function properly.
